fullText:
一款延迟超低的端到端语音模型：VITA-Audio，7B参数，首次生成音频53ms，比同规模模型快3–5倍

核心是它在第一次前向传播中直接生成可解码的Audio Token Chunk

与传统的自回归模型需要多次迭代生成不同，它通过预填充token的机制，使模型在接收到输入后立即开始生成音频，来响应速度 https://t.co/m1DIQo75z8
It seems to me that AGI would mean the end of prompt engineering. Moderately intelligent humans can figure out what you want without elaborate prompts. So by definition so would AGI.

fullText:
I can’t stop thinking about « Low Tech AI » which seems the intersection of a couple of fully independent trends I see right now in ai

Trends 1a/1b: Intelligence

1a – AI models size stays generally constant or even decrease nowadays. Today’s model tend to have similar

One way to understand the subtle tricks used by really great writers would be to give their work to the median editor. The result would be the midwrite version. You could then compare that to the original to see what great writers do differently.
Optimus will perform ballet perfectly https://t.co/q2ch8p0xH4

酷，用OpenMemory MCP，给AI工具加上一个可共享的大脑，让AI工具可以记住并共享之前的交互信息，保持上下文，本地运行

比如说，你用不同的AI工具设计了一个游戏角色，你需要修角色的某个属性，只要在OpenMemory MCP中修改一次，所有使用该信息的AI工具就都会更新，不用逐个修改
